name: Bloo’s Magic Trip
overview: Bloo’s Magic Trip was a neat “Jack Attack” clone developed by Gareth Taft back in 1991, with his “Magic Trip” probably due to the magic mushrooms he has to consume no doubt! The creator worked with Zeppelin Games for some time but the project never moved forward, in 1993, as it had not been picked up for publication, he released it as PD homebrew.
